hero.title: NINLARO® (ixaomib) Provides Durable Strength With Long-term* Proteasome Inhibition1-4
hero.subheading: NINLARO is the first efficacious, all-oral triple regimen† for patients with multiple myeloma after one prior therapy.1,5,6 NINLARO has been clinically proven to provide a broad range of patients with a deep, durable response in their multiple myeloma treatment.1-3,7-9
hero.references:
*Defined as treatment to disease progression or unacceptable toxicity.
†The NINLARO regimen includes NINLARO+lenalidomide+dexamethasone.
